scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const distPath = path.join(__dirname, 'dist'); if (fs.existsSync(distPath)) { fs.rmSync(distPath, { recursive: true, force: true }); }"
scripts.convert:excel:clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const files = ['scripts/convertExcelToJson.js', 'scripts/convertExcelToJson.d.ts']; files.forEach(f => { try { fs.unlinkSync(f); } catch(e) {} });"
scripts.convert:excel:compile: tsc scripts/convertExcelToJson.ts --outDir scripts --module commonjs --target es2020 --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --resolveJsonModule --moduleResolution node
scripts.convert:excel: npm run convert:excel:clean && npm run convert:excel:compile && npm run convert:excel:fix && node scripts/convertExcelToJson.js
